product_name: Sugoi RPM Bike Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Sugoi RPM bike jacket offers waterproof, breathable protection without weighing you down. Lightweight, durable materials help you go farther, faster. Waterproof, breathable 2.5-layer laminated shell protects against chilling wind and moisture; taped seams help prevent water penetration. Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Microfleece lining at collar has the softness of flannel, enhancing warmth and dispersing moisture. Reflective details on front zipper, sleeves and lower back boost your visibility to motorists. Keep the elements out with elasticized cuffs that adjust with rip-and-stick closure tabs. Deep droptail back with elastic hem supplies a snug, smooth fit and keeps you protected from spray and rain while you're in the riding position. Sugoi RPM jacket features a waterproof front zipper with guard to prevent leaks. Zippered core vents allow cooling airflow during highly aerobic activities. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Sugoi RPM bike jacket offers waterproof, breathable protection without weighing you down. Lightweight, durable materials help you go farther, faster.
